description: Devloop workflow hooks - v3.0 minimal version for efficiency

notes.v3.0_changes: REMOVED all prompt-type hooks for efficiency. They were causing extra LLM calls on every tool use. Removed: UserPromptSubmit (command suggestions), PreToolUse prompts (skill suggestions, file validation, bash validation), PostToolUse prompts (bash analysis, task assessment), Stop prompt (routing), Notification prompts. Kept only command-type hooks for git commit validation and session lifecycle.
notes.removed_hooks_count: 9 prompt hooks removed, saving ~9+ LLM calls per session
notes.SubagentStop: REMOVED in v2.1.0 - Hook cannot detect agent modes.
